special_text:
[+2]: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, draw a card. Otherwise, create a Blood token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
[-3]: Gain control of target creature until Count Dracula leaves the battlefield.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature dies, create a 2/2 black Vampire creature token with flying.”
